testcase.name: Integration Tests > CLI Integration > should validate configuration
Integration Tests > CLI Integration > should show help with enhanced features
Integration Tests > CLI Integration > should handle sync commands
Integration Tests > Plugin System Integration > should install and manage plugins
Integration Tests > Plugin System Integration > should validate plugin security
Integration Tests > Workflow Automation Integration > should execute workflow triggers
Integration Tests > Workflow Automation Integration > should handle workflow conditions
Integration Tests > Template System Integration > should apply project templates
Integration Tests > Template System Integration > should validate template compatibility
Integration Tests > Error Recovery Integration > should handle sync conflicts gracefully
Integration Tests > Error Recovery Integration > should recover from network failures
Integration Tests > Performance Integration > should handle large sync operations efficiently
Integration Tests > Performance Integration > should monitor resource usage
Integration Tests > Security Integration > should enforce plugin sandboxing
Integration Tests > Security Integration > should validate digital signatures
Integration Tests > Cross-Platform Integration > should work on different operating systems
Integration Tests > Cross-Platform Integration > should handle path separators correctly
Integration Tests > Data Integrity Integration > should verify data integrity during sync
Integration Tests > Data Integrity Integration > should detect and report corruption
Integration Tests > Real-world Scenarios > should handle typical development workflow
Integration Tests > Real-world Scenarios > should handle error recovery workflow
Integration Tests

failure.message: process.chdir() is not supported in workers

testcase.name: GitHub API Integration Tests > API Mocking > should mock GitHub API responses
GitHub API Integration Tests > API Mocking > should handle API error responses
GitHub API Integration Tests > Environment Setup > should have test environment variables
GitHub API Integration Tests > Environment Setup > should have test data directory
